<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar Oddities](/Feats.aspx?ID=3830) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 169</row>

**Archetype** [Curse Maelstrom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=190)

**Prerequisites**
[Curse Maelstrom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3829); Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) or Trained in [Curse Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

Perhaps due to the curse within you, curses occasionally perceive you as an extension of themselves and readily reveal themselves to you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=24) on a [cursed item](/equipment/cursed-items) or a spell that has the [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38) trait.
